description: Mapping file for codex items that cannot be directly matched to API items by name+tier

usage.intermediate: Items crafted and consumed immediately in recipes - always assume 0 in inventory
usage.gathered: Raw resources that convert to another item on collection - track the converted form instead
usage.reagent: Process reagents crafted and consumed in single recipe chains
usage.mob_drop: Creatures that yield materials when killed - track the drop items instead
usage.fish: Fish/seafood caught via fishing - track in inventory
usage.container: Container items with API naming differences
usage.research: Codex research goals, not inventory items
usage.alias: Items with naming mismatches requiring API verification
usage.likely_api: Items following standard API pattern - verify with full API list
